question: Government e-Marketplace (GeM) portal has been recently integrated with which portal?
explanation:
Recently, the Government e Marketplace (GeM) has been successfully integrated with Central Public Procurement Portal (CPPP).
By doing so, the entire process of public procurement of goods and services have been brought under a single platform. The function of ''custom bid'' is also created in the platform, which will allow a buyer to float a bid on GeM.
